title: The copies of certaine letters vvhich haue passed betweene Spaine and England in matter of religion Concerning the generall motiues to the Romane obedience. Betweene Master Iames Wadesworth, a late pensioner of the holy Inquisition in Siuill, and W. Bedell a minister of the Gospell of Iesus Christ in Suffolke.
author: Wadsworth, James, 1572?-1623.
publisher: Printed by William Stansby for William Barret and Robert Milbourne,
notes: Edited by Bedell, who signs the dedication.
Includes a letter from Joseph Hall.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
